ReportSection.title: ATSEC Decision Regarding Merit
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Eleni Stroulia
Vice Dean of Science
Chair Academic Teaching Staff Evaluation Committee

I am writing to inform you that the Academic Teaching Staff Evaluation Committee (ATSEC) has accepted the recommendation of your Department Chair and awarded you 0B as you are at the top of the current salary scale.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your work this past year and to wish you continued success in your teaching.

Should you have any procedural questions, please contact the Secretary to ATSEC, Lori Dammann-Thomson, at 780-492-6232 or sciea@ualberta.ca.

Sincerely,


Eleni Stroulia
Vice Dean of Science
Chair of the Academic Teaching Staff Evaluation Committee
